languages.text: {n}Дрожь, в которой смешались нечестивый восторг и животный ужас, пробегает по вашему хребту. Нет никаких сомнений — ярость Каллигоса подпитывается кроваво-красными всполохами скверны, охватившими его душу. Ненасытная, первозданная и разрушительная, она поглощает его все больше и больше с каждым мгновением.{/n}

{n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожь, в которой смешались нечестивый восторг и животный ужас, пробегает по вашему хребту. Нет никаких сомнений — ярость Каллигоса подпитывается кроваво-красными всполохами скверны, охватившими его душу. Ненасытная, первозданная и разрушительная, она поглощает его все больше и больше с каждым мгновением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A shiver, in which are mixed unholy delight and animal fear, runs through your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of filth that are wound tight about his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}A shiver, in which are mixed unholy delight and animal fear, runs through your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of filth that are wound tight about his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}A shiver, that mixes unholy delight and animal fear, runs through your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of filth that are wound tight about his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}A shiver, that mixes unholy delight and animal fear, runs through your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of filth that are wound tight about his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un escalofrío que mezcla pánico visceral y placer impío recorre tu espalda. Está claro: la furia de Calligos está siendo espoleada por los fogonazos de color rojo sangre de la corrupción que devora su alma. Algo insaciable, primordial y destructivo le consume más y más con cada segundo que pasa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un escalofrío te recorre la espalda, una mezcla de pánico visceral y placer impío. Está claro: la furia de Calligos está siendo espoleada por los fogonazos de color rojo sangre que atenazan su alma. Algo insaciable, primordial y destructivo le consume más y más con cada segundo que pasa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉到脊背上传来一阵战栗，其中混合着邪恶的喜悦与发自本能的恐惧。毫无疑问，某种血红色的腐化之物紧紧缠绕着卡里戈斯的灵魂，激发了他的怒火。野蛮的腐化之物永远不知满足，充满了对破坏的渴望。随着时间的流逝，它会一步步将他吞噬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉到脊背上传来一阵战栗，其中混合着邪恶的喜悦与野兽般的恐惧。毫无疑问，某种血红色的污秽之物紧紧缠绕着卡里戈斯的灵魂，激发了他的怒火。这种污秽之物永远不知满足，野蛮而极具破坏性。随着时间的流逝，它会一步步将他吞噬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un frisson de plaisir impie et de terreur viscérale parcourt votre corps. Une chose est sûre : la rage de Calligos se nourrit des éclairs rouge sang de la corruption qui enserre son âme. Primaire, destructeur et toujours affamé, elle le consume un peu plus à chaque instant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un frisson de plaisir impie et de terreur animale parcourt votre corps. Une chose est sûre : la rage de Calligos se nourrit des éclairs rouge sang du mal qui enserre son âme. Primaire, destructeur et toujours affamé, il le consume un peu plus à chaque instant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不浄の喜びと獣の恐怖が入り混じった戦慄が背筋を走る。カリゴスの怒りは、彼の魂にきつく巻き付いた腐敗した血のように赤く、穢れた閃光によってもたらされているのは明らかだった。常に飢え、原初的で破壊的なそれは、時を追うごとに彼を蝕んでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不浄の喜びと獣の恐怖が入り混じった戦慄が背筋を走る。カリゴスの怒りは、彼の魂にきつく巻き付いた腐敗した血のように赤く、穢れた閃光によってもたらされているのは明らかだった。常に飢え、原初的で破壊的なそれは、時を追うごとに彼を蝕んでいく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir läuft es kalt den Rücken hinunter, eine Mischung aus unheiligem Entzücken und urzeitlicher Angst. Es ist sicher: Calligos' Wut wird durch die blutroten Blitze der Verderbnis genährt, die eng um seine Seele gewunden sind. Unersättlich, urzeitlich und zerstörerisch verschlingt es ihn mit jedem Augenblick mehr und mehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir läuft ein Schaudern den Rücken hinunter, das unheiliges Entzücken und animalische Angst vereint. Es ist sicher: Calligos' Wut wird durch die blutroten Blitze Schmutz genährt, die eng um seine Seele gewunden sind. Unersättlich, urzeitlich und zerstörerisch verschlingt es ihn mit jedem Augenblick mehr und mehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçgüdüsel korkuyla karışık uğursuz bir hazla tüylerin diken diken oluyor. Artık şüphen yok. Calligos'un öfkesini ruhunu sıkı sıkıya sarmış kan kızılı yozlaşma parıltıları besliyor. Mütemadiyen aç, ilkel ve yıkıcı bu öfke; geçen her dakikayla birlikte onu daha da tüketiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shiver of unholy delight mixed with visceral fear runs down your spine. It is certain — Calligos's rage is fed by the blood-red flashes of corruption coiled tightly around his soul. Ever-hungry, primordial, and destructive, it consumes him more and more with each passing moment.{/n}
